caption.p: Transverse thin-section CT scans in patients with COVID-19 disease: (A) 56 year-old man, day 3 after symptom onset; (B) 74 year-old woman, day 10 after symptom onset; (C) 61 year-old woman, day 20 after symptom onset; and (D) 63 year-old woman, day 17 after symptom onset.
